root.name: Shikigami no Shiro: Nanayozuki Gensoukyoku
root.description: OverviewShikigami no Shiro: Nanayozuki Gensoukyoku (A.K.A Castle Shikigami: Fantasy of the Seven Moon Night) is an adventure/shooter developed by Alfa System and published by Kids Station for the PlayStation 2 platform.The game was only released in Japan.
